name: Last Night on Mars
description:
Last Night on Mars is a retro arcade shooter developed for our Vintage Vision system. Become an Inner Planetary Alliance Starfighter and defend the last city on Mars from the native Martians attackers. Buy the citizens of the city as much time as possible to evacuate before the last city on Mars is lost.

Vintage Vision

The Vintage Vision is our fake custom system that defines and limits the colors, sounds, and resolution of each game developed for the system. This uniformity across games gives the feel of a real classic system without being constrained by the same limitations of actual hardware of the time.

Install Instructions

Unpack the .zip file and run the application inside. Keep all files together.
